title: sannutinceta
sahitya:
sannutinceta sadguru ninu sannutinceta sadguru ninu anudinamunu


P:  sannutinceta sadguru ninu sannutinceta sadguru ninu anudinamunu
A:  karuNApUra nI caraNa kanjamE maraNammanu nA lOni shaktini gAnacEyumu 
muraLI rava sudhA sarOvarambuna viharincerA yancava gAvinci AdarincavayyA
